name: One More Round (HarrieMcRacc, TriggerExcited)
description:
Your name is Cole Dice, a gambling addict who loses all their money due to a bad bet. Depressed, you drive into a tree and fall in a coma. Inside the coma world, you have to survive the dangerous invisible Inspectors and solving difficult puzzles by randomizing the way you move around, with your assistant, Zari, overlooking your progress. Will you be able to escape the coma a better person, or succumb to your addiction?

CONTROLS

Press Left and Right to move. Space to jump.
If more than 3 similarities are found in the board at the same time you loose.

DEVS

TriggerExcited (Programming)

https://itch.io/profile/triggerexcited

HarrieMcRacc (Art)

https://itch.io/profile/harriemcracc

We know the game is scuffed, its our first project and we definitely bit off more than we could chew, hope you enjoy it though :D
